name: Brass Nataraja Idol
description: Handcrafted brass Nataraja idol made by traditional artisans using the ancient lost-wax casting technique. Each piece is unique and represents the cosmic dance of Lord Shiva.

name: Carved Teak Elephant
description: Intricately hand-carved teak wood elephant with traditional Rajasthani motifs. A symbol of wisdom and good fortune, perfect for home decor.

name: Banarasi Silk Tapestry
description: Handwoven Banarasi silk tapestry featuring traditional floral and paisley patterns with gold zari work. A masterpiece representing centuries of weaving tradition.

name: Marble Ganesha Statue
description: Exquisite hand-carved white marble Ganesha statue from the artisans of Jaipur. Each piece showcases remarkable detailing and spiritual significance.

name: Copper Wall Art Panel
description: Hand-hammered copper wall panel featuring traditional Indian motifs. The natural patina develops over time, adding character to each piece.

name: Bronze Krishna Flute Player
description: Stunning bronze statue of Lord Krishna playing the divine flute. Crafted using traditional Dhokra metal casting technique native to Odisha.

name: Sheesham Wood Jewelry Box
description: Hand-carved sheesham wood jewelry box with intricate brass inlay work. Features traditional floral patterns passed down through generations.

name: Pashmina Embroidered Shawl
description: Luxurious hand-embroidered Pashmina shawl featuring traditional Kashmiri paisley patterns. Each shawl takes months to complete.

name: Sandstone Buddha Head
description: Serene Buddha head sculpture carved from red sandstone by temple sculptors of Mahabalipuram. Represents peace and enlightenment.

name: Iron Tribal Art Figurine
description: Authentic Bastar tribal art figurine made from wrought iron. Each piece is handcrafted by indigenous artisans using age-old techniques.
